scripts.upgrade:db: yarn db add --dev typescript esbuild pkg
scripts.upgrade:bot: yarn bot add --dev typescript esbuild pkg
scripts.upgrade:mgr: yarn mgr add --dev typescript esbuild pkg
scripts.upgrade:ui: yarn ui add --dev typescript snowpack @types/react @types/react-dom && yarn ui add react react-dom
scripts.upgrade-devdeps: yarn upgrade:ui && yarn upgrade:util && yarn upgrade:bot && yarn upgrade:mgr && yarn upgrade:anal && yarn upgrade:db
scripts.remove-artifacts: concurrently "yarn bot remove-logs" "yarn mgr remove-logs" "yarn anal cleanup"
